オプション1: Star Man, half-conscious, walked in search of water. Fortunately, rainwater had collected in the hollows of rocks due to the recent typhoon.

オプション1: Star Man had only ever drunk processed water like tap water or bottled drinks.
His smartphone no longer powered on. Star Man looked around.
About 100 meters away, Star Man saw a flying saucer. It was moving about one meter above the ground.
Star Man was curious about the flying object, but the water in front of him was the priority right now.
(I don’t have anything to boil it with, and I’m at my limit.)
Star Man brought his nose close to the rainwater.
Star Man put his face into the water and drank directly.
(It tastes strange... But I can’t tell if that’s good or bad...)
Right after drinking it, it wasn’t that bad, but as time passed, the saltiness came on.
(Ugh... it's salty... Could this be making things worse...?)
